embed.title: How to put your XLR Mic into Voicemeeter
embed.description:
Follow this video
English- https://youtu.be/KesZ38tzHws?si=6JIa3KBJRIdHJNYz
French-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=35N8hkOy8h4)

or read (https://voicemeeter.com/setup-a-mic-with-your-asio-audio-interface/ ).

**IMPORTANT:** For the part about Patch ASIO inputs to strips make it say **1 - 1 instead**. This will make your mic work for the left channel and right channel.
